metadata.title: CVE-2022-0792 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 99.0.4844.51 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
